title: Weekly Review with Clay and Buck H3 - Feb 12 2022
itunes:title: Weekly Review with Clay and Buck H3 - Feb 12 2022
description:
Democrats are lifting mask mandates all over the country, claiming the science has changed. The science hasn't changed! You were WRONG, libs! And Buck notes, "This is a hill I will gladly die on -- unmasked. It doesn't work, it didn't work, and they're crazy." James Carville says he wants to punch unvaccinated people in the face. Clay says that includes him, but "I've got him by 30 years and probably 30 pounds so it's not exactly a fair fight." Stacey Abrams apologizes, but she's still lying about why she was maskless in a school full of masked kids. Crime expert Heather Mac Donald joins Clay and Buck to discuss the crime wave, the war on cops (which is also the title of her book), and how to fight back against the Democrats' race-based crime policies. The greatest female swimmer of all-time -- a dude?

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
